name: Lahaul and Spiti
description: Lahaul and Spiti is known for its stark landscapes, ancient monasteries, and unique culture. The district offers a perfect blend of adventure, spirituality, and natural beauty, with high-altitude passes and pristine valleys.
summary: Land of High Passes and Monasteries

locations.name: Keylong
locations.description: Keylong is the district headquarters known for its administrative importance and stunning views of the surrounding mountains. It's a perfect base for exploring Lahaul Valley.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: June to September

travelTips.bestTime: June to September when Rohtang Pass is open
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Manali, requires permit
travelTips.accommodation: Multiple options available, book in advance

locations.name: Kaza
locations.description: Kaza is the sub-divisional headquarters of Spiti Valley, known for its ancient monasteries and stunning landscapes. It's a perfect base for exploring Spiti Valley.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: June to September

travelTips.bestTime: June to September when Kunzum Pass is open
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for local expenses
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Manali/Shimla, requires permit
travelTips.accommodation: Multiple options available, book in advance

locations.name: Kibber
locations.description: Kibber is one of the highest inhabited villages in the world, known for its stunning views and unique culture. It's a perfect destination for nature lovers and cultural enthusiasts.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: June to September

travelTips.bestTime: June to September for pleasant weather
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for local expenses
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Kaza, requires permit
travelTips.accommodation: Limited options available, book in advance

locations.name: Tabo Monastery
locations.description: Tabo Monastery is one of the oldest and most important monasteries in Spiti Valley, known for its ancient murals and spiritual significance. It's a perfect destination for spiritual seekers and history enthusiasts.

travelTips.bestTime: June to September when roads are accessible
travelTips.currency: Indian Rupee (INR) - carry cash for donations
travelTips.transportation: Regular buses and taxis from Kaza, requires permit
travelTips.accommodation: Limited options available, book in advance

locations.name: Chandratal Lake
locations.description: Chandratal Lake is a high-altitude lake known for its stunning beauty and crescent moon shape. It's a perfect destination for nature lovers and adventure enthusiasts.
locations.hours: Best time to visit: June to September

travelTips.bestTime: June to September when roads are accessible
